job_tasks.phrase: MLOps Engineer to help streamline our ML development process
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions 'MLOps Engineer' and 'streamline our ML development process', which are core to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: support to our R&D Researchers in all aspects of the MLOps lifecycle
job_tasks.justification: Directly states support across the entire 'MLOps lifecycle'.

job_tasks.phrase: establish general coding standards when it comes to ML and MLOps
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on establishing standards for ML and MLOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Assist R&D Researchers with fixing issues with their current setups (this includes troubleshooting, integrating CI/CD etc.)
job_tasks.justification: Involves troubleshooting and integrating CI/CD, which are key MLOps activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Help define our "1 click process" to create custom services and data-pipelines
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on automating the creation of services and data pipelines, a common MLOps goal.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement new tooling in the areas of orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, Infrastructure as Code
job_tasks.justification: Highlights implementation of tooling for core MLOps areas like orchestration, experiment tracking, deployment, and IaC.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct research & implement ways to improve standardisation of environments across R&D Teams
job_tasks.justification: Improving environment standardization is an operational concern within MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Create / Improve infrastructure for Github Actions
job_tasks.justification: Github Actions are a CI/CD tool, directly related to MLOps infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve Template capabilities - you will be in charge of our basic ML repository
job_tasks.justification: Managing and improving ML repositories and templates falls under operationalizing ML development.

job_tasks.phrase: We have built our own workflow engine
job_tasks.justification: While the role is MLOps, contributing to or working with a workflow engine implies software development aspects.
The goal of streamlining and improving processes is to accelerate the work of research teams, indicating a link to business impact.

soft_skills.phrase: fixing issues with their current setups (this includes troubleshooting, integrating CI/CD etc.)
you will be in charge of our basic ML repository
Conduct research & implement ways to improve standardisation of environments

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes 'MLOps', 'streamlining ML development', 'CI/CD', 'experiment tracking', 'service deployment', and 'Infrastructure as Code'. While it mentions research teams, the core responsibilities are focused on building and maintaining the operational infrastructure and processes for ML, aligning with the MLOps aspect of the ML Engineer profile.
